trans-unit.source: Walkthrough: Monitor Microsoft Dynamics CRM with Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Walkthrough: Monitor Microsoft Dynamics CRM with Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Get telemetry from Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online using Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Get telemetry from Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online using Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: Walkthrough of setup, getting data, visualization and export.
trans-unit.target: Walkthrough of setup, getting data, visualization and export.

trans-unit.source: Walkthrough: Enabling Telemetry for Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online using Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Walkthrough: Enabling Telemetry for Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online using Application Insights

trans-unit.source: This article shows you how to get telemetry data from [Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online](https://www.dynamics.com/) using [Visual Studio Application Insights](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/application-insights/).
trans-unit.target: This article shows you how to get telemetry data from [Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online](https://www.dynamics.com/) using [Visual Studio Application Insights](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/application-insights/).

trans-unit.source: We’ll walk through the complete process of adding Application Insights script to your application, capturing data, and data visualization.
trans-unit.target: We’ll walk through the complete process of adding Application Insights script to your application, capturing data, and data visualization.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] [Browse the sample solution](https://dynamicsandappinsights.codeplex.com/).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] [Browse the sample solution](https://dynamicsandappinsights.codeplex.com/).

trans-unit.source: Add Application Insights to new or existing CRM Online instance
trans-unit.target: Add Application Insights to new or existing CRM Online instance

trans-unit.source: To monitor your application, you add an Application Insights SDK to your application.
trans-unit.target: To monitor your application, you add an Application Insights SDK to your application.

trans-unit.source: The SDK sends telemetry to the [Application Insights portal](https://portal.azure.com), where you can use our powerful analysis and diagnostic tools, or export the data to storage.
trans-unit.target: The SDK sends telemetry to the [Application Insights portal](https://portal.azure.com), where you can use our powerful analysis and diagnostic tools, or export the data to storage.

trans-unit.source: Create an Application Insights resource in Azure
trans-unit.target: Create an Application Insights resource in Azure

trans-unit.source: Get [an account in Microsoft Azure](http://azure.com/pricing).
trans-unit.target: Get [an account in Microsoft Azure](http://azure.com/pricing).

trans-unit.source: Sign into the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com) and add a new Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: Sign into the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com) and add a new Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: This is where your data will be processed and displayed.
trans-unit.target: This is where your data will be processed and displayed.

trans-unit.source: Click +, Developer Services, Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Click +, Developer Services, Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: Choose ASP.NET as the application type.
trans-unit.target: Choose ASP.NET as the application type.

trans-unit.source: Open the Quick Start tab and open the code script.
trans-unit.target: Open the Quick Start tab and open the code script.

trans-unit.source: **Keep the code page open** while you do the next step in another browser window.
trans-unit.target: **Keep the code page open** while you do the next step in another browser window.

trans-unit.source: You'll need the code soon.
trans-unit.target: You'll need the code soon.

trans-unit.source: Create a JavaScript web resource in Microsoft CRM
trans-unit.target: Create a JavaScript web resource in Microsoft CRM

trans-unit.source: Open your CRM Online instance and login with administrator privileges.
trans-unit.target: Open your CRM Online instance and login with administrator privileges.

trans-unit.source: Open Microsoft Dynamics CDM Settings, Customizations, System
trans-unit.target: Open Microsoft Dynamics CDM Settings, Customizations, System

trans-unit.source: Create a JavaScript resource.
trans-unit.target: Create a JavaScript resource.

trans-unit.source: Give it a name, select **Script (JScript)** and open the text editor.
trans-unit.target: Give it a name, select **Script (JScript)** and open the text editor.

trans-unit.source: Copy the code from Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Copy the code from Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: The code includes the instrumentation key that identifies your Application insights resource.
trans-unit.target: The code includes the instrumentation key that identifies your Application insights resource.

trans-unit.source: Save and publish.
trans-unit.target: Save and publish.

trans-unit.source: Instrument Forms
trans-unit.target: Instrument Forms

trans-unit.source: In Microsoft CRM Online, open the Account form
trans-unit.target: In Microsoft CRM Online, open the Account form

trans-unit.source: Open the form Properties
trans-unit.target: Open the form Properties

trans-unit.source: Add the JavaScript web resource that you created
trans-unit.target: Add the JavaScript web resource that you created

trans-unit.source: Save and publish your form customizations.
trans-unit.target: Save and publish your form customizations.

trans-unit.source: Metrics captured
trans-unit.target: Metrics captured

trans-unit.source: You have now set up telemetry capture for the form.
trans-unit.target: You have now set up telemetry capture for the form.

trans-unit.source: Whenever it is used, data will be sent to your Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: Whenever it is used, data will be sent to your Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: Here are samples of the data that you'll see.
trans-unit.target: Here are samples of the data that you'll see.

trans-unit.source: Application health
trans-unit.target: Application health

trans-unit.source: Browser exceptions:
trans-unit.target: Browser exceptions:

trans-unit.source: Click the chart to get more detail:
trans-unit.target: Click the chart to get more detail:

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: Usage

trans-unit.source: Browsers
trans-unit.target: Browsers

trans-unit.source: Geolocation
trans-unit.target: Geolocation

trans-unit.target: Inside page view request

trans-unit.target: Sample code

trans-unit.target: [Browse the sample code](https://dynamicsandappinsights.codeplex.com/).

trans-unit.source: Power BI
trans-unit.target: Power BI

trans-unit.source: You can do even deeper analysis if you [export the data to Microsoft Power BI](app-insights-export-power-bi.md).
trans-unit.target: You can do even deeper analysis if you [export the data to Microsoft Power BI](app-insights-export-power-bi.md).
